Vi vil gøre tingene rigtigt Vi vil hjælpe dem der har kontrollen. Vi vil se en ny fremtid for menneskeheden.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_512291"><![CDATA[Sammen i Formål]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_512292"><![CDATA[Det er en andetn fremragende præstations, Pilot! Demanerne vil snart forsvinde igen. Bemærk vores ord, vi tror virkelig, at vi kan nå længere under et banner, menneskelighedens banner. Dit arbejde har kun styrket vores beslutsomhed og vi vokser igen i antal. held og lykke indtil vi vender tilbage. Stol på ministeriet!]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_512292"><![CDATA[Autoritet er styrke]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_122000"><![CDATA[Saml kuber]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_122000"><![CDATA[Pilot, vores analyser viser at Cubikons må være kommet og gået fra denne sektor. Jeg forstår, at det ikke forholder sig sådan, derfor er vi parat til at tildele en særlig titel til de af jer, der er villige til at kæmpe og ødelægge denne fjende og derefter vende tilbage. Vi beder om meget, men det er belønningen værd.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_122001"><![CDATA[Rens Protegitten]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_122001"><![CDATA[Det er på tide at komme ud i rummet og fjerne rumvæsen problemet før det vokser sig for stort. De siger Protegit formerer sig hurtigere end jordens gamle kaniner, så det er bedre at tage sig tid til, at sikre at de er fortid. Vi ved, at vi beder om en fuldstændig tilintetgørelse af dem, men for at være ærlige fortjener de det og belønningerne. De er gode!]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_122002"><![CDATA[Interceptor irritation]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_122002"><![CDATA[Interceptor er blevet et stort problem i vores sektorer. De synes simpelthen at komme ud af ingenting, hvilket forårsager ødelæggelse og kaos på vores skibsfart. Derfor er det på tide at lukke deres operationer ved at tvære massevis af dem ud. En lang opgave, som vil blive belønnet fuldt ud. Som du kan se.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_122003"><![CDATA[Annihilator Anthem]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_122003"><![CDATA[Når vores aktivitet er på det laveste, ser det ud til at Annihilator ser det som en mulighed for at trænge sig på. Vi er befriet fra deres kløer og vender tilbage til territoriet,. Hvis du tager denne patrulje mission og rydder vejen for vores fartøjer, vil vi være mere end taknemmelige. Drabstallet er højt, men det er belønningerne værd.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_122004"><![CDATA[Silent Sabotage]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_122004"><![CDATA[Med et stigende antal Saboteurs, er det blevet afgørende at sænke deres antal, hjælpe vores fraktion og handle for at støtte menneskeheden. Vi ved aldrig, hvornår den næste angrebsbølge kommer ind i vores rum, så hvis du sørger for at holde deres antal nede, vil belønningen være umagen værd.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_122005"><![CDATA[Ubegrænset Uber]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_122005"><![CDATA[Du er den pilot vi ville have. Kontrollen har rapporteret, at Uber Protegit er blevet et stadig større og besværligt problem, der fører andre Protegit hertil, fordi de anser deres ledere som stærke. Bevis for dem, at de er svage overfor menneskeheden. Udryd et stort antal og vend tilbage hertil for at få din præmie.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_122006"><![CDATA[Udryddelse]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_122006"><![CDATA[Det er på tide at du viser dit værd og udrydder alle fjendens skibe der er derude. Ja, enhver fraktionel indflydelse du finder, der er ikke vores, kan dø. Det hjælper os med, at etablere os som en dominerende styrke i galaksen og lærer resten af dem en tydelig lektie. Synes du ikke?]]></item>
<item name="quest_description_505283_mmo"><![CDATA[This is an emergency beacon *STOP* Virus synthesizing in VRU systems *STOP* Need assistance *STOP* Objectives identified *STOP*]]></item>
<item name="quest_description_505283_eic"><![CDATA[Alert! *STOP* VRU systems infected *STOP* Communications systems failing *STOP* Please assist. *STOP*]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505283_vru"><![CDATA[Pilot. Something seems to have synthesized itself in our systems; a virus we thought we’d eradicated. It seems that it’s affecting numerous programs throughout the VRU so be careful out there and make sure you eliminate any threat we identify. If we can contain this threat quickly, it shouldn’t blow out of proportion.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505283"><![CDATA[Battling the Virus]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505284_mmo"><![CDATA[We’ve been given special clearance to speak to you. Whilst you may be on the grubbier end of the spectrum it appears this virus is affecting us all. Therefore, on this one occasion your organization has revoked the Warbond and is allowing you to work for us. Be warned, pilot, we are monitoring your actions. Keep your nose clean.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505284_eic"><![CDATA[We’ve agreed with your imperialist masters that you can work for us on this occasion. Please note we will be monitoring our assets carefully and be warned, if we are not united in our response, the virus could adapt and spread into all ship systems, leaving us open to attack. Often we have to take a path that is less beaten.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505284_vru"><![CDATA[The virus seems to be spreading further. The same one that affected the P.E.T.s in the past, which is strange as our science division said they’d eradicated it. Because of the special circumstances and the threat to all humanities defense systems we’re going to also call in MMO and EIC pilots and suspend the Warbond.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505284"><![CDATA[Special Clearance]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505285_mmo"><![CDATA[Not as efficient as VRU pilots by any stretch of the imagination but you’ve done the job. Although I think some training in etiquette would help, as our hanger staff have been complaining about oil marks in the docking bays. This virus is similar to the P.E.T. virus, which we thought we’d eradicated. Perhaps the EIC released a sample.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505285_eic"><![CDATA[Although we appreciate your help, please don’t have ideas above your station. Whilst we’re happy for you to share our information this does not mean you can broadcast EIC propaganda throughout our space, so make sure you calm that shit down. Seems this virus is the one that affected P.E.T.s previously. Thought we’d killed that one.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505285_vru"><![CDATA[If we can’t pin down this virus soon there’s no end to the damage it can cause. Four of our officers Augmented Reality headsets went on the blink, meaning they ejected themselves from an airlock because they thought they were heading to the refectory. It’s essential we pin this virus down as soon as possible.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505285"><![CDATA[Spread Mechanics]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505286_mmo"><![CDATA[We’ve tracked down the reason this viral strain is spreading but not where it stemmed from. Although we think there have been equal problems in your organization. Still, this does not stop the fact that we need to stop this thing, and you MMO people are used to getting your hands dirty, so best you get on with it.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505286_eic"><![CDATA[We may have some information about the release of the virus, and believe me, the EIC are just as much to blame. However, we still haven’t uncovered the root of the infection. Which is something we’ll be tasking you all with as we move forward. However, suppression of the infection is the first thing on the cards.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505286_vru"><![CDATA[As embarrassing as it is for us to admit, it appears that the virus spread in our systems because one of our staff thought it would be very post-modern to make their password, ‘password’! A person who has now been incarcerated for a considerable period of time. So we’ll take some responsibility for the virus’ spread.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505286"><![CDATA[Reactivating the Strain]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505287_mmo"><![CDATA[We’ve had a theory and want to test something out. We’re not sure if this will affect anything on your ship but, let’s face facts, you MMO are always talking about how tough you are. Best be prepared all the same as your blunt tactics are proving useful. Once you have resolved your objectives come back to us.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505287_eic"><![CDATA[Every time you respond to us, it’s like we’re hearing a voice from the past. You must try and stop the EIC imperialist rot and just respond like a normal human being. We have a test for you to complete, it may be dangerous but that’s what you people are all about, isn’t it? Get out there and complete the objectives and tell us the results.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505287_vru"><![CDATA[Our scientists have managed to pin down a flaw in the viral makeup so we can test some counter measures. Creating some areas where P.E.T.s don’t work. We need you to check this region out to confirm that everything is going according to plan and then destroy another two of the rogue P.E.T.s so we can gather samples in isolation.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505287"><![CDATA[Counter Measures]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505288_mmo"><![CDATA[Not bad, pilot. A little bit direct, but you Martians are all the same. Keeping things simple and leaving the proper science to people like the great VRU. However, the theory we were testing hasn’t worked as expected. The virus has rebuffed some of our attempts and so we need more samples to discover what is controlling this infection.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505288_eic"><![CDATA[You certainly make your point, pilot. Not the way we’d do it, a little bit too much derring-do rather than efficient logical thinking. You got the job done and so it’s now become clear that something else is controlling the virus, as our anti-viral program is not taking full effect. Time to investigate further and gather more evidence.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505288_vru"><![CDATA[So part of that worked, part didn’t. We’re much closer to reestablishing vital systems throughout the VRU now, using the tech we discovered to aid their protection. The issue is what is controlling these damn P.E.T.s. We sent out an anti-virus and it just seems to have hit a brick wall. Better get us some more evidence to analyze.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505288"><![CDATA[Controlling Factor]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505289_mmo"><![CDATA[Seems there’s an ‘Alpha’ out there who is controlling all the others. Which has seemingly created a backdoor into the rogue P.E.T.s systems. Meaning the only way to stop this viral infection is to kill the alpha and then deploy the anti-virus again, before anything can adapt. You’ll need to work hard, but that’s the MMO doctrine, isn’t it?]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505289_eic"><![CDATA[We’ve uncovered the root of the problem and it appears that there’s an alpha P.E.T. out there somewhere, which is managing to operate a backdoor in the rogue P.E.T.s you’ve encountered. It’s important we pin this threat down as soon as possible so we can bring things back to normal and stop depending on outside help!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505289_vru"><![CDATA[If all our calculations are correct it looks like there’s an Alpha P.E.T. behind all of this, although we have no idea who created it. We may be wrong but it seems to suggest a more advanced technology than the VRU. Once it’s been eradicated things should settle down but we need to pinpoint it first and that’s where you come in!]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505289"><![CDATA[Alpha Alert]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505290_mmo"><![CDATA[I guess you’ll be happy to know that this Alpha seems to have been created by a cross company failure. Whilst we eradicated the virus before, a number of units were too deep in space to be affected. In turn they adapted and created the Alpha P.E.T.s which are now causing us so many problems.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505290_eic"><![CDATA[So, it appears that the reason for the existence of these ‘Alpha’s’ is due to a failure of all the companies to clean up their mess after the previous infection. A group of P.E.T.s left isolated and allowed to adapt and reform into a more powerful force. I guess this is what we pay for constant improvement.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505290_vru"><![CDATA[I know some of you have been asking but this P.E.T. problem doesn’t appear to be linked to other events, it just seems that when the eradication signal was sent out when this happened previously, it didn’t reach a bunch of P.E.T.s in deep space. Where they adapted and formed a new Alpha, based on all the companies' tech.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505290"><![CDATA[Other Agendas]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505291_mmo"><![CDATA[I know how your MMO techs will view this but for the VRU we are delighted to have discovered a new protocol from the ashes of these events. One that will certainly enhance P.E.T.s in the future. So, your blunt actions have proven useful but, in reality, you are hardly the type of pilot we would be expecting to join the VRU.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505291_eic"><![CDATA[We’re just waiting for the EIC to pompously announce that they found this first but rest assured the VRU are the ones who discovered the new protocol in the heart of all this madness. Seems that something good has come about from your actions, and I bet you can’t say that often when working for your normal bosses.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505291_vru"><![CDATA[It appears that what harms us may also act as a boon. The rogue P.E.T.’s are showing higher Protocols which we can definitely utilize. If these events have proven one thing it’s that the VRU policy of constant adaptation is a powerful ally when creating new technology. But be reassured, your role here will not be ignored.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505291"><![CDATA[A New Protocol]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505292_mmo"><![CDATA[Well, I can’t say it’s been nice but you’ve definitely done a job and so, if you destroy the Alpha P.E.T. we’ll reward you with a special treat. Let’s just call it something to remember us by. Now please remove all your greasy items from the pilots lounge and get the hell out of our region of space. I’m sure the MMO have their own problems!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505292_eic"><![CDATA[Now that your tasks are nearly complete, just that Alpha P.E.T. to defeat, I’d say it’s time we advise you that you'll receive a special prize. Well, we know an imperialist like you won’t be happy but I’m sure if you do some work for the ‘glorious’ EIC and MMO as well you may get something better.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505292_vru"><![CDATA[Now we’ve pinned the Alpha P.E.T. down it’s time to obliterate it and we’ve created a special treat for you, to celebrate your coming victory. So it’s time to go and face that beast so we can lose this business and start our independent operations up again. I’ve also heard if you aid the MMO and EIC you may be able to combine the P.E.T.’s together!]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505292"><![CDATA[P.E.T End]]></item>
<item name="quest_description_514283_mmo"><![CDATA[This is an emergency beacon *STOP* Virus synthesizing in VRU systems *STOP* Need assistance *STOP* Objectives identified *STOP*]]></item>
<item name="quest_description_514283_eic"><![CDATA[Alert! *STOP* VRU systems infected *STOP* Communications systems failing *STOP* Please assist. *STOP*]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514283_vru"><![CDATA[Pilot. Something seems to have synthesized itself in our systems; a virus we thought we’d eradicated. It seems that it’s affecting numerous programs throughout the VRU so be careful out there and make sure you eliminate any threat we identify. If we can contain this threat quickly, it shouldn’t blow out of proportion.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514283"><![CDATA[Battling the Virus]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514284_mmo"><![CDATA[We’ve been given special clearance to speak to you. Whilst you may be on the grubbier end of the spectrum it appears this virus is affecting us all. Therefore, on this one occasion your organization has revoked the Warbond and is allowing you to work for us. Be warned, pilot, we are monitoring your actions. Keep your nose clean.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514284_eic"><![CDATA[We’ve agreed with your imperialist masters that you can work for us on this occasion. Please note we will be monitoring our assets carefully and be warned, if we are not united in our response, the virus could adapt and spread into all ship systems, leaving us open to attack. Often we have to take a path that is less beaten.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514284_vru"><![CDATA[The virus seems to be spreading further. The same one that affected the P.E.T.s in the past, which is strange as our science division said they’d eradicated it. Because of the special circumstances and the threat to all humanities defense systems we’re going to also call in MMO and EIC pilots and suspend the Warbond.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514284"><![CDATA[Special Clearance]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514285_mmo"><![CDATA[Not as efficient as VRU pilots by any stretch of the imagination but you’ve done the job. Although I think some training in etiquette would help, as our hanger staff have been complaining about oil marks in the docking bays. This virus is similar to the P.E.T. virus, which we thought we’d eradicated. Perhaps the EIC released a sample.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514285_eic"><![CDATA[Although we appreciate your help, please don’t have ideas above your station. Whilst we’re happy for you to share our information this does not mean you can broadcast EIC propaganda throughout our space, so make sure you calm that shit down. Seems this virus is the one that affected P.E.T.s previously. Thought we’d killed that one.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514285_vru"><![CDATA[If we can’t pin down this virus soon there’s no end to the damage it can cause. Four of our officers Augmented Reality headsets went on the blink, meaning they ejected themselves from an airlock because they thought they were heading to the refectory. It’s essential we pin this virus down as soon as possible.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514285"><![CDATA[Spread Mechanics]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514286_mmo"><![CDATA[We’ve tracked down the reason this viral strain is spreading but not where it stemmed from. Although we think there have been equal problems in your organization. Still, this does not stop the fact that we need to stop this thing, and you MMO people are used to getting your hands dirty, so best you get on with it.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514286_eic"><![CDATA[We may have some information about the release of the virus, and believe me, the EIC are just as much to blame. However, we still haven’t uncovered the root of the infection. Which is something we’ll be tasking you all with as we move forward. However, suppression of the infection is the first thing on the cards.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514286_vru"><![CDATA[As embarrassing as it is for us to admit, it appears that the virus spread in our systems because one of our staff thought it would be very post-modern to make their password, ‘password’! A person who has now been incarcerated for a considerable period of time. So we’ll take some responsibility for the virus’ spread.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514286"><![CDATA[Reactivating the Strain]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514287_mmo"><![CDATA[We’ve had a theory and want to test something out. We’re not sure if this will affect anything on your ship but, let’s face facts, you MMO are always talking about how tough you are. Best be prepared all the same as your blunt tactics are proving useful. Once you have resolved your objectives come back to us.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514287_eic"><![CDATA[Every time you respond to us, it’s like we’re hearing a voice from the past. You must try and stop the EIC imperialist rot and just respond like a normal human being. We have a test for you to complete, it may be dangerous but that’s what you people are all about, isn’t it? Get out there and complete the objectives and tell us the results.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514287_vru"><![CDATA[Our scientists have managed to pin down a flaw in the viral makeup so we can test some counter measures. Creating some areas where P.E.T.s don’t work. We need you to check this region out to confirm that everything is going according to plan and then destroy another two of the rogue P.E.T.s so we can gather samples in isolation.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514287"><![CDATA[Counter Measures]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514288_mmo"><![CDATA[Not bad, pilot. A little bit direct, but you Martians are all the same. Keeping things simple and leaving the proper science to people like the great VRU. However, the theory we were testing hasn’t worked as expected. The virus has rebuffed some of our attempts and so we need more samples to discover what is controlling this infection.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514288_eic"><![CDATA[You certainly make your point, pilot. Not the way we’d do it, a little bit too much derring-do rather than efficient logical thinking. You got the job done and so it’s now become clear that something else is controlling the virus, as our anti-viral program is not taking full effect. Time to investigate further and gather more evidence.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514288_vru"><![CDATA[So part of that worked, part didn’t. We’re much closer to reestablishing vital systems throughout the VRU now, using the tech we discovered to aid their protection. The issue is what is controlling these damn P.E.T.s. We sent out an anti-virus and it just seems to have hit a brick wall. Better get us some more evidence to analyze.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514288"><![CDATA[Controlling Factor]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514289_mmo"><![CDATA[Seems there’s an ‘Alpha’ out there who is controlling all the others. Which has seemingly created a backdoor into the rogue P.E.T.s systems. Meaning the only way to stop this viral infection is to kill the alpha and then deploy the anti-virus again, before anything can adapt. You’ll need to work hard, but that’s the MMO doctrine, isn’t it?]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514289_eic"><![CDATA[We’ve uncovered the root of the problem and it appears that there’s an alpha P.E.T. out there somewhere, which is managing to operate a backdoor in the rogue P.E.T.s you’ve encountered. It’s important we pin this threat down as soon as possible so we can bring things back to normal and stop depending on outside help!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514289_vru"><![CDATA[If all our calculations are correct it looks like there’s an Alpha P.E.T. behind all of this, although we have no idea who created it. We may be wrong but it seems to suggest a more advanced technology than the VRU. Once it’s been eradicated things should settle down but we need to pinpoint it first and that’s where you come in!]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514289"><![CDATA[Alpha Alert]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514290_mmo"><![CDATA[I guess you’ll be happy to know that this Alpha seems to have been created by a cross company failure. Whilst we eradicated the virus before, a number of units were too deep in space to be affected. In turn they adapted and created the Alpha P.E.T.s which are now causing us so many problems.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514290_eic"><![CDATA[So, it appears that the reason for the existence of these ‘Alpha’s’ is due to a failure of all the companies to clean up their mess after the previous infection. A group of P.E.T.s left isolated and allowed to adapt and reform into a more powerful force. I guess this is what we pay for constant improvement.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514290_vru"><![CDATA[I know some of you have been asking but this P.E.T. problem doesn’t appear to be linked to other events, it just seems that when the eradication signal was sent out when this happened previously, it didn’t reach a bunch of P.E.T.s in deep space. Where they adapted and formed a new Alpha, based on all the companies' tech.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514290"><![CDATA[Other Agendas]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514291_mmo"><![CDATA[I know how your MMO techs will view this but for the VRU we are delighted to have discovered a new protocol from the ashes of these events. One that will certainly enhance P.E.T.s in the future. So, your blunt actions have proven useful but, in reality, you are hardly the type of pilot we would be expecting to join the VRU.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514291_eic"><![CDATA[We’re just waiting for the EIC to pompously announce that they found this first but rest assured the VRU are the ones who discovered the new protocol in the heart of all this madness. Seems that something good has come about from your actions, and I bet you can’t say that often when working for your normal bosses.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514291_vru"><![CDATA[It appears that what harms us may also act as a boon. The rogue P.E.T.’s are showing higher Protocols which we can definitely utilize. If these events have proven one thing it’s that the VRU policy of constant adaptation is a powerful ally when creating new technology. But be reassured, your role here will not be ignored.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514291"><![CDATA[A New Protocol]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514292_mmo"><![CDATA[Well, I can’t say it’s been nice but you’ve definitely done a job and so, if you destroy the Alpha P.E.T. we’ll reward you with a special treat. Let’s just call it something to remember us by. Now please remove all your greasy items from the pilots lounge and get the hell out of our region of space. I’m sure the MMO have their own problems!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514292_eic"><![CDATA[Now that your tasks are nearly complete, just that Alpha P.E.T. to defeat, I’d say it’s time we’d advise you that we have a prize we’ll give you. Well, we know an imperialist like you won’t be happy but I’m sure if you do some work for the ‘glorious’ EIC and MMO as well you may get something better.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514292_vru"><![CDATA[Now we’ve pinned the Alpha P.E.T. down it’s time to obliterate it and we’ve created a special treat for you, to celebrate your coming victory. So it’s time to go and face that beast so we can lose this business and start our independent operations up again. I’ve also heard if you aid the MMO and EIC you may be able to combine the P.E.T.’s together!]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514292"><![CDATA[P.E.T End]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505293_mmo"><![CDATA[Citizen. It appears that we have had a viral outbreak, which is spreading quickly across our subsystems. Luckily, MMO technology is built with redundancies in mind, so we’ve managed to replace many of those systems to maintain a working operation. However, guess what, we need you to investigate!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505293_eic"><![CDATA[Please stand by! Normal service will resume shortly. Your call is valuable to us! Please stand…. Can anyone out there hear me? Need help… failure… Computer virus spreading through… systems. Assist please!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505293_vru"><![CDATA[Welcome to Mars Mining Operations. Your call is held in a queue and will be answered shortly! If you require further assistance… This is a General Distress Call. Help. We’ve got system wide failures. Can you assist us?]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505293"><![CDATA[Outbreak]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505294_mmo"><![CDATA[Much as we don’t appreciate the EIC and VRU it seems that this global problem will require us to work together to resolve this problem. Therefore, pilots of the other companies may also be helping resolve this. We need to be pragmatic about this process so we’d appreciate it if you concentrate on the rogue P.E.T.s.]]></item>
<item name="quest_description_505294_eic"><![CDATA[Oh, thank god. So pleased… able to assist… Communications systems… failing. P.E.T.s appear… rogue. Giving… MMO clearance… assist.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505294_vru"><![CDATA[Who’d have thought that you VRU tech-heads would be helping out the MMO. Still, as we say. ‘Union is Power’ so it seems we’re in the same boat. We’re not asking you to sign up with us but perhaps you can still assist in dealing with this rogue P.E.T. problem.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505294"><![CDATA[Clearance Given]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505295_mmo"><![CDATA[This virus seems to be spreading. My wife told me that the auto-cook tried to chop her up this morning – although the company who made it are associated with the EIC, so no surprise. If things keep escalating even the robust MMO systems may be at threat. So, we need you to act quickly to solve things, my friend.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505295_eic"><![CDATA[Issues… spreading. Vital you still… We could die… assistance. Please don’t abandon us. We revoke… Warbond in this situation… Work… solve problem. Continue to aid…]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505295_vru"><![CDATA[I hear you had some issues with the cleanliness of our facilities. Perhaps you’ve not seen a real days work in your life, where people actually act together, rather than merely adapt their surroundings. Still, for now the Warbond has been lifted and, despite better judgement, your help is ‘welcome’. So show us what you’ve got.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505295"><![CDATA[Escalation]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505296_mmo"><![CDATA[Much as we like to keep things simple here in the MMO it doesn’t help when our citizens take that too literally. The virus appears to have spread from an unknown source that one of our staff opened. Apparently, a prince who needed his family’s riches protected. Clearly false. By identifying the source, we can hopefully find a cure.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505296_eic"><![CDATA[Communications systems… stabilizing. Failure… security. Thanks for your help, comrade. There’s still much to do but if you can consider working for us further we’ll make sure you are rewarded. Although we have issues with the EIC, you seem to understand our values in the MMO. Now please complete the tasks we have set.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505296_vru"><![CDATA[It appears the virus was released into our systems by a failure on each company’s part. Yes, even your precious VRU, technical wizards that you are, have added to this problem. Let it be known that the MMO take responsibility for our issues. Rewarding you for any actions you undertake. Just show us what you can do.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505296"><![CDATA[The Curse of Security]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505297_mmo"><![CDATA[Citizen. We’ve managed to pin down the issues and generally clear MMO systems of immediate threats. I can’t say the other two companies have acted as quickly, but we still have a problem to deal with and so cannot take advantage of the situation. We need to test our findings. Please get out there and do your job!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505297_eic"><![CDATA[Seems that MMO command have utilized a fix, which has brought most of our systems back online. The rogue P.E.T.’s are still a problem though. Your assistance is still worthwhile and almost valued. Let me clarify. Your imperialist leaders still subjugate their workers but perhaps you can see the benefits of working with the MMO?]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505297_vru"><![CDATA[Were in the process of administering a galaxy wide fix. Well before the VRU have made one of their own, I might add. It seems that the fix still hasn’t impacted on the rogue P.E.T.s out there so we still need your assistance in helping eradicate this problem, once and for all. I hope you’re ready to do a proper days work?]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505297"><![CDATA[Taking Advantage]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505298_mmo"><![CDATA[The information you gathered is useful, citizen, but we’re still unclear what is controlling these rogue P.E.T.s. As the tests we performed based on the valuable evidence you gathered, did not manage to stop these devices. It’s almost as if there is something else out there controlling their very nature. Can you do some more investigating for us?]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505298_eic"><![CDATA[Well, seems the virus had a more complex structure than we thought. Potentially linked to the viral outbreak of the past. Although who can say how that managed to recur, as we thought it had been eradicated. Until we have identified the source of things, we need you to keep assisting the MMO. So please follow the mission instructions.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505298_vru"><![CDATA[When things bubble up from the past it really annoys us. The MMO appreciate simple systems we all can understand, equality in the workforce and a true future for mankind. It appears that the viral outbreak of the past, where P.E.T.s went rogue is equally responsible for this outbreak. Even your help is valuable in bringing about a resolution.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505298"><![CDATA[Puppet Master]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505299_mmo"><![CDATA[Seems we might have a main P.E.T. out there who keeps rewriting the others protocols, ensuring we can’t control them. Whatever the method, it simply appears that these P.E.T.s need to be destroyed. Nothing else will resolve the issue now and if we can’t stop the source, we’ll never stop the infection. Please act in our best interests, citizen.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505299_eic"><![CDATA[All the evidence is pointing to something else rewriting the code of the rogue P.E.T.s as everything the MMO throws at them is overridden. When it was first formed the EIC created this type of back-door, in order to control their people. Not that we’re blaming you, pilot, you’re just a pawn in their plans. Better to help us with ours.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505299_vru"><![CDATA[With the evidence you’ve gathered and with a bit of co-ordination with the other companies, which the MMO arranged of course, we can see that there appears to be another, more powerful, P.E.T. out there. We’re hoping you can keep your agenda clear to help us finally solve these problems and will honor our agreements if you finish the job.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505299"><![CDATA[Top of the Tree]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505300_mmo"><![CDATA[It appears that this problem is of our own making. Whilst others have recently raised their heads, like the Ministry, as well as the continued elimination of our facilities on the Rim, it appears this is down to us. We should have cleaned out the deepest regions of space, where these P.E.T.s have been slowly adapting themselves. We will learn from our errors.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505300_eic"><![CDATA[The MMO are sure a companywide issue throughout the known galaxy created these events. So we’re all to blame but whilst the EIC blusters about and the VRU seem to fail to acknowledge their part of this the MMO have taken action. We still need you to prove you’re better than the rest of your organization so please continue.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505300_vru"><![CDATA[I know you’re proud of the genetic spread of the VRU but let me be clear to you. It’s the MMO who started negotiations to finally end this issue and it will be the MMO who people trust in the future. We’re willing to admit our hand in this problem, as it appears P.E.T.s were missed during the last outbreak. Please resolve this.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505300"><![CDATA[Of Our Own Making]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505301_mmo"><![CDATA[Citizen. The earlier reports about unusual protocols have made us analyze the data we gathered and realize that a new Protocol for the P.E.T.s is possible. We’re delighted to share this news for you and have also been developing a special reward for you, once this crisis is over. You’re almost there, comrade. You’re almost there.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505301_eic"><![CDATA[It seems what we’re learning from our research is that new protocols may be available. Ones that we’ll be ensuring aid the MMO pilots as they reach further towards the stars in order to spread our word of unity. I know you’re sad your imperialist company cannot say the same. Nevertheless, we’re planning a great reward when all is done.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505301_vru"><![CDATA[The techs at MMO HQ have defined a new level of protocol from the evidence you and our pilots gathered. Clearly, the MMO gathered more of the vital evidence. Which means potential enhancements to P.E.T.’s. Helping us spread the word of our efficiency further. Time to complete the last couple of jobs for us, before you go.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505301"><![CDATA[Practical Results]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505302_mmo"><![CDATA[The final mission we have for you will pit you against this rogue Alpha P.E.T. To commemorate your victory we’ve managed to develop something special for you. One that, when integrated with the rewards that the EIC and VRU are providing, might just be equally rewarding. Just remember that the tech at the heart is still MMO!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505302_eic"><![CDATA[Before we re-establish the Warbond it is important to recognize your services to the MMO. So once you’ve taken out the Alpha P.E.T. we’ll give you something special, to commemorate your time with us. We know in the future you’ll realize we’re the better organization. Now head out and destroy the final threat.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505302_vru"><![CDATA[We have to grudgingly admit that you’ve been helpful. Although your sense of etiquette is far too overdeveloped for the workings of our trueborn people. However it is good to show you the other and better way of doing things and before the Warbond is established we’d like to thank you for your help. Now tidy up this last thing.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505302"><![CDATA[Battle for Control]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514293_mmo"><![CDATA[Citizen. It appears that we have had a viral outbreak, which is spreading quickly across our subsystems. Luckily, MMO technology is built with redundancies in mind, so we’ve managed to replace many of those systems to maintain a working operation. However, guess what, we need you to investigate!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514293_eic"><![CDATA[Please stand by! Normal service will resume shortly. Your call is valuable to us! Please stand…. Can anyone out there hear me? Need help… failure… Computer virus spreading through… systems. Assist please!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514293_vru"><![CDATA[Welcome to Mars Mining Operations. Your call is held in a queue and will be answered shortly! If you require further assistance… This is a General Distress Call. Help. We’ve got system wide failures. Can you assist us?]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514293"><![CDATA[Outbreak]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514294_mmo"><![CDATA[Much as we don’t appreciate the EIC and VRU it seems that this global problem will require us to work together to resolve this problem. Therefore, pilots of the other companies may also be helping resolve this. We need to be pragmatic about this process so we’d appreciate it if you concentrate on the rogue P.E.T.s.]]></item>
<item name="quest_description_514294_eic"><![CDATA[Oh, thank god. So pleased… able to assist… Communications systems… failing. P.E.T.s appear… rogue. Giving… MMO clearance… assist.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514294_vru"><![CDATA[Who’d have thought that you VRU tech-heads would be helping out the MMO. Still, as we say. ‘Union is Power’ so it seems we’re in the same boat. We’re not asking you to sign up with us but perhaps you can still assist in dealing with this rogue P.E.T. problem.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514294"><![CDATA[Clearance Given]]></item>

<item name="quest_title_514295"><![CDATA[Escalation]]></item>

Yes, even your precious VRU, technical wizards that you are, have added to this problem. Let it be known that the MMO take responsibility for our issues. Rewarding you for any actions you undertake. Just show us what you can do.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514296"><![CDATA[The Curse of Security]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514297_mmo"><![CDATA[Citizen. We’ve managed to pin down the issues and generally clear MMO systems of immediate threats. I can’t say the other two companies have acted as quickly, but we still have a problem to deal with and so cannot take advantage of the situation. We need to test our findings. Please get out there and do your job!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514297_eic"><![CDATA[Seems that MMO command have utilized a fix, which has brought most of our systems back online. The rogue P.E.T.’s are still a problem though. Your assistance is still worthwhile and almost valued. Let me clarify. Your imperialist leaders still subjugate their workers but perhaps you can see the benefits of working with the MMO?]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514297_vru"><![CDATA[Were in the process of administering a galaxy wide fix. Well before the VRU have made one of their own, I might add. It seems that the fix still hasn’t impacted on the rogue P.E.T.s out there so we still need your assistance in helping eradicate this problem, once and for all. I hope you’re ready to do a proper days work?]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514297"><![CDATA[Taking Advantage]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514298_mmo"><![CDATA[The information you gathered is useful, citizen, but we’re still unclear what is controlling these rogue P.E.T.s. As the tests we performed based on the valuable evidence you gathered, did not manage to stop these devices. It’s almost as if there is something else out there controlling their very nature. Can you do some more investigating for us?]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514298_eic"><![CDATA[Well, seems the virus had a more complex structure than we thought. Potentially linked to the viral outbreak of the past. Although who can say how that managed to recur, as we thought it had been eradicated. Until we have identified the source of things, we need you to keep assisting the MMO. So please follow the mission instructions.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514298_vru"><![CDATA[When things bubble up from the past it really annoys us. The MMO appreciate simple systems we all can understand, equality in the workforce and a true future for mankind. It appears that the viral outbreak of the past, where P.E.T.s went rogue is equally responsible for this outbreak. Even your help is valuable in bringing about a resolution.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514298"><![CDATA[Puppet Master]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514299_mmo"><![CDATA[Seems we might have a main P.E.T. out there who keeps rewriting the others protocols, ensuring we can’t control them. Whatever the method, it simply appears that these P.E.T.s need to be destroyed. Nothing else will resolve the issue now and if we can’t stop the source, we’ll never stop the infection. Please act in our best interests, citizen.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514299_eic"><![CDATA[All the evidence is pointing to something else rewriting the code of the rogue P.E.T.s as everything the MMO throws at them is overridden. When it was first formed the EIC created this type of back-door, in order to control their people. Not that we’re blaming you, pilot, you’re just a pawn in their plans. Better to help us with ours.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514299_vru"><![CDATA[With the evidence you’ve gathered and with a bit of co-ordination with the other companies, which the MMO arranged of course, we can see that there appears to be another, more powerful, P.E.T. out there. We’re hoping you can keep your agenda clear to help us finally solve these problems and will honor our agreements if you finish the job.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514299"><![CDATA[Top of the Tree]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514300_mmo"><![CDATA[It appears that this problem is of our own making. Whilst others have recently raised their heads, like the Ministry, as well as the continued elimination of our facilities on the Rim, it appears this is down to us. We should have cleaned out the deepest regions of space, where these P.E.T.s have been slowly adapting themselves. We will learn from our errors.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514300_eic"><![CDATA[The MMO are sure a companywide issue throughout the known galaxy created these events. So we’re all to blame but whilst the EIC blusters about and the VRU seem to fail to acknowledge their part of this the MMO have taken action. We still need you to prove you’re better than the rest of your organization so please continue.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514300_vru"><![CDATA[I know you’re proud of the genetic spread of the VRU but let me be clear to you. It’s the MMO who started negotiations to finally end this issue and it will be the MMO who people trust in the future. We’re willing to admit our hand in this problem, as it appears P.E.T.s were missed during the last outbreak. Please resolve this.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514300"><![CDATA[Of Our Own Making]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514301_mmo"><![CDATA[Citizen. The earlier reports about unusual protocols have made us analyze the data we gathered and realize that a new Protocol for the P.E.T.s is possible. We’re delighted to share this news for you and have also been developing a special reward for you, once this crisis is over. You’re almost there, comrade. You’re almost there.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514301_eic"><![CDATA[It seems what we’re learning from our research is that new protocols may be available. Ones that we’ll be ensuring aid the MMO pilots as they reach further towards the stars in order to spread our word of unity. I know you’re sad your imperialist company cannot say the same. Nevertheless, we’re planning a great reward when all is done.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514301_vru"><![CDATA[The techs at MMO HQ have defined a new level of protocol from the evidence you and our pilots gathered. Clearly, the MMO gathered more of the vital evidence. Which means potential enhancements to P.E.T.’s. Helping us spread the word of our efficiency further. Time to complete the last couple of jobs for us, before you go.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514301"><![CDATA[Practical Results]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514302_mmo"><![CDATA[The final mission we have for you will pit you against this rogue Alpha P.E.T. To commemorate your victory we’ve managed to develop something special for you. One that, when integrated with the rewards that the EIC and VRU are providing, produces an equally good reward. Just remember that the tech at the heart is still MMO!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514302_eic"><![CDATA[Before we re-establish the Warbond it is important to recognize your services to the MMO. So once you’ve taken out the Alpha P.E.T. we’ll give you something special, to commemorate your time with us. We know in the future you’ll realize we’re the better organization. Now head out and destroy the final threat.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514302_vru"><![CDATA[We have to grudgingly admit that you’ve been helpful. Although your sense of etiquette is far too overdeveloped for the workings of our trueborn people. However it is good to show you the other and better way of doing things and before the Warbond is established we’d like to thank you for your help. Now tidy up this last thing.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514302"><![CDATA[Battle for Control]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505303_mmo"><![CDATA[Good Day. This is a General Distress Call from Earth Industries Corporation. It appears we’re having a spot of bother with a few of our machines. If someone out there could help us out that would be wonderful. No need to rush… Well to be honest if you could rush a little that would be awfully helpful.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505303_eic"><![CDATA[Pilots of the EIC. We need to inform you of some technical problems we’ve discovered in the last few days which seem to be spreading through our systems. I think we’ve been hacked. It appears that some of our technology has gone haywire so it would be great if you could get out there and help. This is not a request!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505303_vru"><![CDATA[Hey there pilots. Something has gone wrong with my mum’s communications array. Which means I can broadcast into VRU territory from EIC military comms. What a rush! I just wanted to say that we all think you in the VRU stink! But mum is asking if you can help us out anyway, as the washing machine appears to be on the blink!]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505303"><![CDATA[Empirical Data]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505304_mmo"><![CDATA[Smashing job there, pilot. I always thought that you MMO people were a little bit backwards but it seems you know how to complete a mission. I’d just like to explain that I’m not officially speaking on behalf of the EIC, but I’m sure, given the circumstances, that we can ask for more of your aid. “Bound for Victory”, as we say! You ready?]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505304_eic"><![CDATA[Captain, I’m releasing you from the Warbond for now. It appears this virus has affected all the EIC communications and all and sundry are broadcasting out and seeking aid. Some of the other main companies have come to their aid too. There’s a lot going on at the moment and as we try and get control back, we have another mission for you.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505304_vru"><![CDATA[It’s so cool I’m telling you what to do. While the image on your communication screen is still the high commander. So now pilot, you’re working for me and will follow my instructions! Oops, sorry of that sounded all official, it’s my first time doing this. You can call me Billy if that helps. I seem to be getting emergency signals, can you help them out?]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505304"><![CDATA[War of Words]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505305_mmo"><![CDATA[Well done you! It appears you managed to smash those blighters to smithereens. You MMO people are quite blunt when dealing with this stuff. It also appears that P.E.T.s seem to be infected as well. Heard that they’re going rogue all across space. Hope you’re the person to deal with this while I mix myself an itty bitty cocktail.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505305_eic"><![CDATA[Believe me pilot, however bad you think things are at your end, they’re a million-and-one times worse here. We’ve got all types of idiots flooding our feed, yet luckily they seem to be directing pilots from the other factions. This problem seems to be spreading and so we need to get on top of things now, before they really go out of control.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505305_vru"><![CDATA[Even for smelly old VRU you seem a little cool. But, don’t let my dad catch my dad saying that. I just keep getting all these distress signals about P.E.T.s here on my panel and am forwarding them to you and the other pilots out there. I reckon I could do this as a job. Let me try my important voice again. ‘Your company needs you. Act now!’]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505305"><![CDATA[P.E.T. Problems]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505306_mmo"><![CDATA[Shame you’re not here to share a drink. I do seem to be all alone with this communication feed and the bar, which I accidently was locked into. Still, I see myself as looking after the place, so I guess the owner owes me a few drinks. Something here says a young Boy called Billy released the virus. Guess he’ll be in trouble, like we’ll be without your help!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505306_eic"><![CDATA[The virus seems to have been sitting dormant in an application which need a special code to trigger it, and one child in the EIC seems to have managed to unlock that code. This simply is not my day, I’m going to have to cancel my dinner plans. Although there seem to be leaks in MMO and VRU territories too. Please try to stem the problems.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505306_vru"><![CDATA[So, I was playing this game, and then I saw this hack sheet online and decided to try it out so I could top the leaderboards. So awesome being inside the code and found this thing called a ‘Doomsday Code’, so I triggered it. After that, the communications started redirecting themselves. How awesome was that?]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505306"><![CDATA[Released into the Wild]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505307_mmo"><![CDATA[Well, that dry martini went down awfully well and I’ve found a book on how to make other cocktails. So I’m about to have a fabulous time. What’s that you say. Next objective. Well, my next objective is to get outrageously… Oh! Your next objective! Why didn’t you say? I’ve sent it to your mission objectives panel. Looks like a lot of fun.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505307_eic"><![CDATA[The boffins have come up with a plan, which might disrupt the P.E.T.s, as they seem to be the main source of the infection. If you can follow the instructions in the mission objectives, we can hopefully quell this and stop it turning into a disaster. Luckily, it’s affecting all the companies so there’s no chance of a pre-emptive strike.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505307_vru"><![CDATA[Mum is telling me I need to go to bed soon. I think that stinks and I told her that I was doing vital stuff for the EIC. Not sure she believed me, she also said she has had some messages from EIC Command asking about my name. Like I started this whole problem, duh! Anyway, you have a mission to do, get to it.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505307"><![CDATA[Close Down]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505308_mmo"><![CDATA[The screen is a little blurred, but I think it says here that your last mission was an unmitigated success. Congratulations, you! Unfortunately, even though you were successful it appears the problems are still ongoing. This is thirsty work. Wonder who’s controlling those P.E.T.s. Sounds like a job for my favorite pilot, eh!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505308_eic"><![CDATA[The data you gathered there was invaluable. It definitely proves that there’s another source, which is overwriting the antiviral code we created. One that seems to be coming from deep space. We’re starting to get the communication streams back in control now, which means we’ll be able to triangulate our methods better. Get back out there!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505308_vru"><![CDATA[No, mum, no! I need to tell the VRU pilot what to do next. I know it’s past my bedtime but pleeaassee. You always said I had a lot of potential, so look. I’m using my potential now. Pilot, I think there’s another source of the virus out there you need to suppress. Mum tells me I’ve got to get ready for bed now.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505308"><![CDATA[Out of Control]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505309_mmo"><![CDATA[So, we’re the best team, aren’t we. You doing the action out there and me monitoring you from this lovely bar, with all its lovely drinks. This one is green, it looks just like a big, big… erm… green thing. Now, on the special screen it says there may be an Alpha P.E.T. What’s one of those then? I wonder if it’s in my cocktail book?]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505309_eic"><![CDATA[Everything is pointing to a rogue Alpha P.E.T. out there. Although we’ll need to pin down its location and we can only do this with your dedicated aid. We’re planning a special reward for you when this is all over, pilot. The team in the labs have become quite excited about what you might have discovered. More later. Act now!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505309_vru"><![CDATA[This is Billy’s mum. I’m not sure what he’s told you but he’s been a very, very, very naughty boy. If he’s responsible for all of this then I don’t know what his dad is going to say. It also tells me you’re a VRU pilot, I’m not sure I should even be talking to you. Sorry? The next mission! Well press accept and get on with it then.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505309"><![CDATA[Top Dog]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505310_mmo"><![CDATA[I think I’m a little bit tipsy. It’s like every bottle has a myriad of glowing stars which are making me a little dizzy and… Sorry, just fell off my chair. I’d say that this whole thing is our own fault. We create new things and then they come and attack us. It’s like the movies, we’re all going to die. Sorry, sorry, I’ll compose myself a little better next time!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505310_eic"><![CDATA[Given the effects of this virus have affected most of humanity I don’t think they relate to anything but the precious time the P.E.T’s went wild. This just shows what happens when you don’t clean up properly. Although the weight of the blame obviously lands in the MMO and VRU’s hands. A few more missions and we’ll be clear.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505310_vru"><![CDATA[No, no! I’m still here. Apparently your transmission is just coming straight back to Billy’s computer now. I’ve been told to keep feeding you information… just let me read this… ‘Even though you are a mortal enemy!’ Did you follow that? It says there are a few missions to complete still. Here’s the next one.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505310"><![CDATA[None of Your Concern]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505311_mmo"><![CDATA[Whatcha sayin’? Do I even know you… or trust you. Well, you have a nice voice and I really, really like nice voices. Like nectar on a rainy day. Tee he! Think they’re going to take back control from me now. But, sshhhh! I didn’t tell you but I think they’ve uncovered a new P.E.T. protocol. Whatever that is it sounds neat! Hic!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505311_eic"><![CDATA[Really glad this is coming to an end, pilot. With the failure in communications systems and a selection of other problems, we seem to be finally getting control of this thing. The other companies have even done their minor parts. Surprising I know! That think we discovered in the lab. Seems we’ve uncovered a new P.E.T. protocol!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505311_vru"><![CDATA[The EIC say they’re going to be taking back control of communications in the next few minutes, so I’ll say goodbye now, before you go. I quite enjoyed telling you what to do for a while, seems better than my job as a manager of a space haulage firm. There’s talk here of a new P.E.T. protocol. Good luck on your travels!]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505311"><![CDATA[Laboratory Analysis]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505312_mmo"><![CDATA[This is EIC Command. We’ve regained control of this communications channel and would like to assure you that the person you were speaking to was not representative of our office. We appreciate your help at this difficult time and would like to reward you for your actions. Please destroy the rogue Alpha P.E.T. to receive this reward!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505312_eic"><![CDATA[Finally, we have control of all our communications channels again. Thanks for your patience and help, pilot. You’ve done the EIC proud in this difficult time. It’s hard to put a value on what you’ve done but our accounting division have done just that, and we’ve a special reward for you if you just kill that damn rogue Alpha P.E.T.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_505312_vru"><![CDATA[Greetings, pilot. We have to thank you for your assistance at this trying time and apologize for the junior spaceman who seems to have been ordering you about. It is not our policy to allow communications to fail, but I think you’re aware of the circumstances. If you destroy that Alpha P.E.T. then we’ll reward you well.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_505312"><![CDATA[Final Call]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514303_mmo"><![CDATA[Good Day. This is a General Distress Call from Earth Industries Corporation. It appears we’re having a spot of bother with a few of our machines. If someone out there could help us out that would be wonderful. No need to rush… Well to be honest if you could rush a little that would be awfully helpful.]]></item>

We need to inform you of some technical problems we’ve discovered in the last few days which seem to be spreading through our systems. I think we’ve been hacked. It appears that some of our technology has gone haywire so it would be great if you could get out there and help. This is not a request!]]></item>

We create new things and then they come and attack us. It’s like the movies, we’re all going to die. Sorry, sorry, I’ll compose myself a little better next time!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514310_eic"><![CDATA[Given the effects of this virus have affected most of humanity I don’t think they relate to anything but the precious time the P.E.T’s went wild. This just shows what happens when you don’t clean up properly. Although the weight of the blame obviously lands in the MMO and VRU’s hands. A few more missions and we’ll be clear.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514310_vru"><![CDATA[No, no! I’m still here. Apparently your transmission is just coming straight back to Billy’s computer now. I’ve been told to keep feeding you information… just let me read this… ‘Even though you are a mortal enemy!’ Did you follow that? It says there are a few missions to complete still. Here’s the next one.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514310"><![CDATA[None of Your Concern]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514311_mmo"><![CDATA[Whatcha sayin’? Do I even know you… or trust you. Well, you have a nice voice and I really, really like nice voices. Like nectar on a rainy day. Tee he! Think they’re going to take back control from me now. But, sshhhh! I didn’t tell you but I think they’ve uncovered a new P.E.T. protocol. Whatever that is it sounds neat! Hic!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514311_eic"><![CDATA[Really glad this is coming to an end, pilot. With the failure in communications systems and a selection of other problems, we seem to be finally getting control of this thing. The other companies have even done their minor parts. Surprising I know! That think we discovered in the lab. Seems we’ve uncovered a new P.E.T. protocol!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514311_vru"><![CDATA[The EIC say they’re going to be taking back control of communications in the next few minutes, so I’ll say goodbye now, before you go. I quite enjoyed telling you what to do for a while, seems better than my job as a manager of a space haulage firm. There’s talk here of a new P.E.T. protocol. Good luck on your travels!]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514311"><![CDATA[Laboratory Analysis]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514312_mmo"><![CDATA[This is EIC Command. We’ve regained control of this communications channel and would like to assure you that the person you were speaking to was not representative of our office. We appreciate your help at this difficult time and would like to reward you for your actions. Please destroy the rogue Alpha P.E.T. to receive this reward!]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514312_eic"><![CDATA[Finally, we have control of all our communications channels again. Thanks for your patience and help, pilot. You’ve done the EIC proud in this difficult time. It’s hard to put a value on what you’ve done but our accounting division have done just that, and we’ve a special reward for you if you just kill that damn rogue Alpha P.E.T.]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_514312_vru"><![CDATA[Greetings, pilot. We have to thank you for your assistance at this trying time and apologize for the junior spaceman who seems to have been ordering you about. It is not our policy to allow communications to fail, but I think you’re aware of the circumstances. If you destroy that Alpha P.E.T. then we’ll reward you well.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_514312"><![CDATA[Final Call]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_506143"><![CDATA[Det er længe siden, vi sidst talte sammen, pilot. Jeg tænkte, at du måske ignorerede mig og havde fået nye venner? Bare rolig, du er her nu, og vi kan samarbejde om at yde modstand mod alientruslen. Mens du får belønninger for at skyde dem i stykker, sender jeg nogle af de fjernstyrede ud for at scanne efter ændringer i teknikken! Aftale? ]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_506143"><![CDATA[Teknikindsamling]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_506144"><![CDATA[Jeg er bekymret over, hvor mange andre, du har arbejdet for på det seneste. Du kunne få alle mulige dårlige vaner fra dem. Det er langt bedre, at du fortsætter med at arbejde for mere passende venner såsom Nyx – og mig selvfølgelig. Lad dig ikke påvirke af de andre. Vi har din ryg, husk det! ]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_506144"><![CDATA[Spredning af indflydelse]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_506145"><![CDATA[Vi leger en farlig leg nu, ligesom hvis vi løb med knive i mørke. Vi presser aliensene tilbage, men der strømmer flere og flere til vores område. Jeg frygter, at der er noget på færde, hvor de kommer fra, siden de foretrækker at kæmpe mod mennesker og hinanden i en krigszone. Noget er i forandring, og det er ikke godt!]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_506145"><![CDATA[At løbe med knive]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_506146"><![CDATA[Du har klaret det godt, pilot. Du har udfordret aliensene og sørget for, at de forstod budskabet. Men jeg ved, at nogle af jer vil vise, at I er de allerbedste. Hjælp med at sikre vores territorier i rummet, og sørg for, at handlende og andre civile skibe kan færdes sikkert.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_506146"><![CDATA[Toppen af poppen]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_510143"><![CDATA[Det er længe siden, vi sidst talte sammen, pilot. Jeg tænkte, at du måske ignorerede mig og havde fået nye venner? Bare rolig, du er her nu, og vi kan samarbejde om at yde modstand mod alientruslen. Mens du får belønninger for at skyde dem i stykker, sender jeg nogle af de fjernstyrede ud for at scanne efter ændringer i teknikken! Aftale?]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_510143"><![CDATA[Teknikindsamling]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_510144"><![CDATA[Jeg er bekymret over, hvor mange andre, du har arbejdet for på det seneste. Du kunne få alle mulige dårlige vaner fra dem. Det er langt bedre, at du fortsætter med at arbejde for mere passende venner såsom Nyx – og mig selvfølgelig. Lad dig ikke påvirke af de andre. Vi har din ryg, husk det!]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_510144"><![CDATA[Spredning af indflydelse]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_510145"><![CDATA[Vi leger en farlig leg nu, ligesom hvis vi løb med knive i mørke. Vi presser aliensene tilbage, men der strømmer flere og flere til vores område. Jeg frygter, at der er noget på færde, hvor de kommer fra, siden de foretrækker at kæmpe mod mennesker og hinanden i en krigszone. Noget er i forandring, og det er ikke godt!]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_510145"><![CDATA[At løbe med knive]]></item>

<item name="quest_description_510146"><![CDATA[Du har klaret det godt, pilot. Du har udfordret aliensene og sørget for, at de forstod budskabet. Men jeg ved, at nogle af jer vil vise, at I er de allerbedste. Hjælp med at sikre vores territorier i rummet, og sørg for, at handlende og andre civile skibe kan færdes sikkert.]]></item>
<item name="quest_title_510146"><![CDATA[Toppen af poppen]]></item>
